prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a dragon with flowing fins and a shimmering tail.
I want a Pokemon design that features bright blue scales and an elegant, serpentine body.
Generate a mythical creature with a vibrant yellow underbelly and delicate white fins.
Make a dragon-inspired Pokemon that is both graceful and powerful, suitable for ocean battles.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends aquatic features with dragon-like traits, showcasing a unique color palette.
Design a Pokemon with a mesmerizing blue hue and distinct flowing fins that capture the essence of the sea.
Give me a character concept for a water-type Pokemon that has a regal appearance and striking features.
